ManageDatabase - Class in database
This class manages the database.

ManagementPanel - Class in view

ManagePaperGUI - Class in view
The Manage Paper User Interface JPanel Allows the user to create access all the information relevant to a conference and a paper in relation to their permissions associated with that paper.
ManagePaperGUI(Controller) - Constructor for class view.ManagePaperGUI
The constructor for the ManagePaperGUI.
MAX_NUMBER_OF_REVIEWS - Static variable in class controller.Controller
The maximum number of reviews a paper can have in the system.
MAX_NUMBER_USER_SUBMITTED_PAPERS - Static variable in class controller.Controller
The maximum number of papers a user in the system is allowed to submit to a conference.
